revised_title: Two Remarkable Medical Cases: Extraordinary Haemorrhage and Ascites Cured by Tapping
tldr: The author presents two medical cases, one of an extraordinary haemorrhage and the other of ascites cured by tapping. The first case involves a gardener who experiences a severe blood flow from a minor foot injury, while the second case is about a woman with an abdominal tumour. Both patients recover after the appropriate medical intervention.
